verses.name: Genesis 19:30
verses.text: And Lot went up out of Zoar, and dwelt in the mountain, and his two daughters with him; for he feared to dwell in Zoar: and he dwelt in a cave, he and his two daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 19:31
verses.text: And the firstborn said unto the younger, Our father is old, and there is not a man in the earth to come in unto us after the manner of all the earth:

verses.name: Genesis 19:32
verses.text: Come, let us make our father drink wine, and we will lie with him, that we may preserve seed of our father.
